item.description:
Hello Fellow Bully Lovers!

This is likely to be a small, semi-private lunch with some esteemed NEBBC members, photographers, trainers and organizers. Great opportunity to learn, network, promote, put your two cents in! (I love to be a "fly on the wall" for get-togethers like this... who knows what you might find out?)

Here's inviting you to a "meeting of the minds." This Friday, October 15th, some esteemed NEBBC members will be meeting for lunch at Uno's in Bellingham to trade material, discuss future events, toss ideas around, meet some new faces from up-and-coming organizations and see how we can all mutually benefit each other. (If you are involved in the pet industry at all, this is also a great opportunity to get your name out there.)

I am really looking forward to meeting some of you.

Punish the Deed, Not the Breed,
Cassie-Leigh Stock
President
New England Bully Breed Clubwww.newenglandbullybreedclub.com
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Cassie, New England Bully Breed Club
item.name: "To Be a Fly on the Wall" Lunch Date
